pr_title: Make EC2 Location supplier memoize on failures

timeline.message: Make EC2 Location supplier memoize on failures

timeline.author: Jolyon-S

replies.bodyText: Giving it a shot, but i don't think it will work. The two suppliers are not "equal", the values they produce are.
replies.author: ashrayjain

replies.bodyText: I was wrong, we are comparing Optionals here, not Suppliers :). It works.
replies.author: ashrayjain

replies.bodyText: yep, that was my thought! Agreed that comparing suppliers would have been wrong though.
replies.author: Jolyon-S
